Group.title: LLC 'Tez Kyzmat Group'
Group.desc: ‚Äî a team of specialists united by one goal: to simplify and speed up the process of finding auto parts and services in Kyrgyzstan.
Group.member1_desc: Founder and CEO. Responsible for strategic development and partnerships.
Group.member2_desc: Co-founder, CFO, and Head of Sales. Ensures the company's stability and growth.
Group.member3_desc: Co-founder, CTO, and Product Manager. Oversees the technical implementation and platform development.

WeTeam.title: We are a team born from the real pains of Kyrgyz drivers and sellers.
WeTeam.desc: We personally experienced the chaos of finding spare parts, high prices, and lack of service. That's why we launched Tez Kyzmat ‚Äî a platform where anyone can quickly find the right part, and businesses can get a stable flow of customers.

block1.desc:

without intermediaries.

across the country.

Order.title: Didn't find the right spare part in KG? Order directly from the UAE!
Order.desc: We deliver original and used parts from Sharjah. Up to 70% cheaper, guaranteed, VIN selection.
Order.desc2: Why does everyone order spare parts from Sharjah (UAE)?
Order.desc3: Sharjah is the spare parts capital of the Middle East. There's a huge market where thousands of cars from Japan, Korea, Europe, and America are dismantled every week. Everything is in great condition, original, and cheaper than here.

Shop.title: Tez Zap ‚Äî our store at Kudaybergen market
